name: Cmod
description:
WASD/arorrw keys to move
hold E to show menu


hold right click to show spawner
hold/left click to spawn/move objects


press 0 - normal
press 1 - edit objects mode

CV to rotate objects
ZX to resize
press delete to delete objects
